fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Umi is the spirit of the Ocean and Sea. They have the unique ability to turn any of their fellow foxes ability into an attack 3 times for a one time use. Basic->powerful, no attack-> basic. Has a one day cool down so can only be done every other day to a maximum of 3 times. Ex: If given to the Kaze, they will rb and deal their target a basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If rolled roll a Kawa or replace a Fox Beta with Kawa if one is already rolled.
